maqras.text: 38|52|tatha unake paas aankhe seemit rakhanee vaalee samaayu patniyaan hongee.
38|53|ye hai jisaka vachan diya ja raha tha tumhen, haisaab ke din.
38|54|ye hai hamaaree jeevika, jisaka koee ant nahin hai.
38|55|ye hai aur avagyaakaariyon ke lie nishchay bura sthaan hai.
38|56|narak hai, jisamen ve jaayenge, kya hee bura aavaas hai.
38|57|ye hai. to tum chakho, khaulata paanee tatha peep.
38|58|tatha kuchh any isee prakaar kee vibhinn yaatanaayen.
38|59|ye[1] ek aur jattha hai, jo ghusa aa raha hai tumhaare saath. koee svaagat nahin hai unaka. vaastav mein, ve narak mein pravesh karane vaale hain.
38|60|ve uttar dengeh balki tum. tumhaara koee svaagat nahin. tum hee aage laaye ho is (yaatana) ko hamaare. to ye bura nivaas hai.
38|61|(phir) ve kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! jo hamaare aage laaya hai ise, use duganee yaatana de narak mein.
38|62|tatha (naarakee) kahengeh hamen kya hua hai ki ham kuchh logon ko nahin dekh rahe hain, jinakee ganana ham bure logon mein kar[1] rahe the
38|63|kya hamane unhen upahaas bana rakha tha athava chook rahee hain unase hamaaree aankhen
38|64|nishchay saty hai naarakiyon ka aapas mein jhagadana.
38|65|he nabee! aap kah den: main to maatr sachet karane vaala[1] hoon tatha koee ( sachcha) poojy nahin hai, akele prabhaavashaalee allaah ke siva.
38|66|vah aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai, sabaka paalanahaar, ati prabhaavashaalee, kshamee hai.
38|67|aap kah den ki ye[1] bahut badee soochana hai.
38|68|aur tum ho ki usase munh pher rahe ho.
38|69|mujhe koee gyaan nahin hai, uchch sabha vaale (farishte) jab vaad-vivaad kar rahe the.
38|70|meree or to maatr isalie vahyee (prakaashana) kee ja rahee hai ki main khula sachet karane vaala hoon.
38|71|jabaki kaha aapake paalanahaar ne farishton seh main paida karane vaala hoon ek manushy, mittee se.
38|72|to jab main use baraabar kar doon tatha phoonk doon usamen, apanee or se rooh (praan), to gir jao usake lie sajda karate hue.
38|73|to sajda kiya sabhee farishton ne ek saath.
38|74|iblees ke siva, usane abhimaan kiya aur ho gaya kaafiron mein se.

38|75|allaah ne kahaah he iblees! kis cheez ne tujhe rok diya sajda karane se usake lie, jise mainne paida kiya apane haath se? kya too abhimaan kar gaya athava vaastav mein too oonche logon mein se hai
38|76|usane kahaah main usase uttam hoon. toone mujhe paida kiya hai agni se tatha use paida kiya mittee se.
38|77|allaah ne kahaah too nikal ja yahaan se, too vaastav mein dhikkrt hai.
38|78|tatha tujhapar meree daya se dooree hai, pralay ke din tak.
38|79|usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! mujhe avasar de us din tak, jab log punah jeevit kiye jaayenge.
38|80|allaah ne kahaah tujhe avasar de diya gaya.
38|81|nirdhaarit samay ke din tak.
38|82|usane kahaah to tere prataap kee shapath! main avashy kupath karake rahoonga sabako.
38|83|tere shudhd bhakton ke siva unamen se.
38|84|allaah ne kahaah to ye saty hai aur main saty hee kaha karata hoon
38|85|ki avashy bhar doonga narak ko tujhase tatha jo tera anusaran karenge unasabase.
38|86|(he nabee!) kah den ki main nahin maang karata hoon tumase isapar kisee paarishramik kee tatha main nahin hoon apanee or se kuchh banaane vaala.
38|87|nahin hai ye (quraan), parantu ek shiksha, sarvalok vaasiyon ke lie.
38|88|tatha tumhen avashy gyaan ho jaayega usake samaachaar (tathy) ka, ek samay ke pashchaat.
39|1|is pustak ka avatarit hona allaah ati prabhaavashaalee, tatvagy kee or se hai.
39|2|hamane aapakee or ye pustak saty ke saath avatarit kee hai. atah, ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee shudhd karate hue usake lie dharm ko.

39|3|sun lo! shudhd dharm allaah hee ke lie (yogy) hai tatha jinhonne bana rakha hai allaah ke siva sanrakshak, ve kahate hain ki ham to unakee vandana isalie karate hain ki vah sameep kar dengen hamen allaah[1] se. vaastav mein, allaah hee nirnay karega unake beech jisamen ve vibhed kar rahe hain. vaastav mein, allaah use supath nahin darshaata jo bada mithyaavaadee, krtaghn ho.
39|4|yadi allaah chaahata ki apane lie santaan banaaye, to chun leta usamen se, jise paida karata hai, jise chaahata. vah pavitr hai! vahee allaah akela sabapar prabhaavashaalee hai.

39|5|usane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko saty ke aadhaar par. vah lapet deta hai raatri ko din par tatha din ko raatri par tatha vashavartee kiya soory aur chandrama ko. pratyek chal raha hai, apanee nirdhaarit avadhi ke lie. saavadhaan! vahee atyant prabhaavashaalee, kshamee hai.

39|6|usane tumhen paida kiya ek praan se, phir banaaya useese usaka joda tatha avatarit kiye tumhaare lie pashuon mein se aath jode. vah paida karata hai tumhen tumhaaree maataon ke garbhaashayon mein ek roop mein, ek roop ke pashchaat, teen andheron mein, yahee allaah hai tumhaara paalanahaar, usee ka raajy hai. koee ( sachcha) vandaneey nahin, usake siva. to tum kahaan phiraaye ja rahe ho

39|7|yadi tum krtaghn bano, to allaah nisprh hai tumase aur vah prasann nahin hota apane bhakton kee krtaghnata se aur yadi krtagyata karo, to vah prasann ho jaayega tumase aur nahin bojh uthaayega koee uthaane vaala doosaron ka bojh. phir tumhaare paalanahaar hee kee or tumhaara phirana hai. to vah tumhen soochit kar dega tumhaare karmon se. vaastav mein, vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai dilon ke bhedon ko.
